languages.text: "Кровь святых! Тогда понятно, почему еретики действуют столь слаженно! Я думал, что блокирование переходов между палубами — его попытка предотвратить распространение врагов по палубам, однако теперь ясно, зачем он это сделал: чтобы затруднить доступ блюстителям! По крайней мере вы живы и теперь в безопасности, госпо{mf|дин|жа} {name}. Только, боюсь, отсидеться в безопасном отсеке нам не удастся".

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Гроксово{/g} семя! Тогда понятно, почему еретики действуют столь слаженно! Я думал, что блокирование переходов между палубами — его попытка предотвратить распространение врагов по палубам, однако теперь ясно, зачем он это сделал: чтобы затруднить доступ блюстителям! По крайней мере вы живы и в теперь в безопасности, госпо{mf|дин|жа} {name}. Только, боюсь, отсидеться в безопасном отсеке нам не удастся".

languages.text: "Saints' blood! Then it is small wonder that the heretics are so well organised! I thought his order to seal the passages between decks was his attempt to stop the attackers from spreading to other levels, but now I see the real reason: it was to stop the enforcers from intervening! At least you are alive and now safe, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}. Alas, I doubt we can afford to look for a compartment to sit out this disaster."
languages.original_text: "Кровь святых! Тогда понятно, почему еретики действуют столь слаженно! Я думал, что блокирование переходов между палубами — его попытка предотвратить распространение врагов по палубам, однако теперь ясно, зачем он это сделал: чтобы затруднить доступ блюстителям! По крайней мере вы живы и теперь в безопасности, госпо{mf|дин|жа} {name}. Только, боюсь, отсидеться в безопасном отсеке нам не удастся".

traits.locale_text: "Grox seed! Then it is small wonder that the heretics are so well organised — they are guided by the Master of Whispers himself! I thought his order to seal all passages between decks was his attempt to stop the attackers from spreading to other levels, but now I see the real reason: it was to stop the enforcers from intervening! At least you are alive and now safe, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}. Alas, I doubt we can afford to look for a compartment to sit out this disaster."

"Grox seed! Then it is small wonder that the heretics are so well organised — they are guided by the Master of Whispers himself! I thought his order to seal all passages between decks was his attempt to stop the attackers from spreading to other levels, but now I see the real reason: it was to stop the enforcers from intervening! At least you are alive and now safe, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}. Alas, I doubt we can afford to look for a compartment to sit out this disaster."

I thought his order to seal all passages between decks was his attempt to stop the attackers from spreading to other levels, but now I see the real reason: it was to stop the enforcers from intervening! At least you are alive and now safe, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}. Alas, I doubt we can afford to look for a compartment to sit out this disaster."

At least you are alive and now safe, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}. Alas, I doubt we can afford to look for a compartment to sit out this disaster."

"{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g} seed! Then it is small wonder that the heretics are so well organised! I thought his order to seal all passages between decks was his attempt to stop the attackers from spreading to other levels, but now I see the real reason: it was to stop the enforcers from intervening! At least you are alive and now safe, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}. Alas, I doubt we can afford to look for a compartment to sit out this disaster."

"{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g} seed! Then it is small wonder that the heretics are so well organised! I thought his order to seal all passages between decks was his attempt to stop the attackers from spreading to other levels, but now I see the real reason: it was to stop the enforcers from intervening! At least you are alive and now safe, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}. Alas, I doubt we can afford to look for a compartment to sit out this disaster."

languages.text: “圣人之血在上！难怪那些异端分子的袭击那么有条不紊。我原本以为，他下令封锁甲板之间的所有通道，是为了阻止入侵者蔓延到其他甲板，但现在我明白了真正的原因。他这么做，是为了阻止执法者进行反击！不过，好消息是，至少您还安然无恙，{name}大人。遗憾的是，恐怕我们没办法找个地方躲起来，等待这场灾难结束。”
languages.original_text: "Saints' blood! Then it is small wonder that the heretics are so well organised! I thought his order to seal the passages between decks was his attempt to stop the attackers from spreading to other levels, but now I see the real reason: it was to stop the enforcers from intervening! At least you are alive and now safe, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}. Alas, I doubt we can afford to look for a compartment to sit out this disaster."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}的孽种啊！难怪那些异端分子的袭击那么有条不紊。我原本以为，他下令封锁甲板之间的所有通道，是为了阻止入侵者蔓延到其他甲板，但现在我明白了真正的原因。他这么做，是为了阻止镇压者进行反击！不过，好消息是，至少您还安然无恙，{name}大人。遗憾的是，恐怕我们没办法找个地方躲起来，等待这场灾难结束。”

languages.text: «¡Por la sangre de los santos! ¡Entonces no me extraña que los herejes estén tan organizados! Pensé que la orden de sellar los pasajes entre las cubiertas era un intento por evitar que los atacantes se extendieran a otros niveles, pero ahora veo cuál era su verdadero objetivo: ¡evitar que intervinieran los guardias! Al menos usted está san{mf|o|a} y salv{mf|o|a}, maestr{mf|o|a} {name}. Por desgracia, me temo que no podemos permitirnos buscar un compartimento en el que esperar a que pase la tormenta».
languages.original_text: "Saints' blood! Then it is small wonder that the heretics are so well organised! I thought his order to seal the passages between decks was his attempt to stop the attackers from spreading to other levels, but now I see the real reason: it was to stop the enforcers from intervening! At least you are alive and now safe, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}. Alas, I doubt we can afford to look for a compartment to sit out this disaster."

traits.locale_text: «¡Cuerno de {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g}! ¡Entonces no me extraña que los herejes estén tan organizados! Pensé que la orden de sellar todos los pasajes entre las cubiertas era un intento por evitar que los atacantes se extendieran a otros niveles, pero ahora veo cuál era su verdadero objetivo: ¡evitar que intervinieran los guardias! Al menos usted está san{mf|o|a} y salv{mf|o|a}, maestr{mf|o|a} {name}. Por desgracia, me temo que no podemos permitirnos buscar un compartimento en el que esperar a que pase la tormenta».

languages.text: 「何ということだ！それなら、異端者たちが非常によく組織化されているのも不思議ではありませんね。デッキ間のすべての通路を封鎖するという彼の命令は、攻撃者が他の階に広がるのを阻止するための命令だと思っていましたが、今、本当の理由がわかりました。エンフォーサーの介入を阻止するためだったんです。少なくとも、{name}様が生きていて無事であることが幸いです。残念ながら、この惨事をやり過ごす部屋を探す余裕があるとは思えません」
languages.original_text: "Saints' blood! Then it is small wonder that the heretics are so well organised! I thought his order to seal the passages between decks was his attempt to stop the attackers from spreading to other levels, but now I see the real reason: it was to stop the enforcers from intervening! At least you are alive and now safe, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}. Alas, I doubt we can afford to look for a compartment to sit out this disaster."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}種！それなら、異端者たちが非常によく組織化されているのも不思議ではありません。デッキ間のすべての通路を封鎖するという彼の命令は、攻撃者が他の階に広がるのを阻止するための命令だと思っていましたが、今、本当の理由がわかりました。執行官の介入を阻止するためだったんです。少なくともあなたは生きていて、今のところは安全です、{mf|マスター|ミストレス} {name}。残念ながら、この災害を回避できるコンパートメントを探す余裕があるとは思えません」

「何ということだ！それなら、異端者たちが非常によく組織化されているのも不思議ではありませんね。デッキ間のすべての通路を封鎖するという彼の命令は、攻撃者が他の階に広がるのを阻止するための命令だと思っていましたが、今、本当の理由がわかりました。エンフォーサーの介入を阻止するためだったんです。少なくとも、{name}様が生きていて無事であることが幸いです。残念ながら、この惨事をやり過ごす部屋を探す余裕があるとは思えません」

languages.text: « Par le sang des saints ! Rien d'étonnant, alors, à ce que les hérétiques soient aussi bien organisés ! J'ai cru qu'en donnant l'ordre de fermer les passages entre les ponts, il cherchait à empêcher les assaillants d'atteindre les autres niveaux, mais en réalité, c'était pour bloquer l'intervention des prévôts ! Au moins, vous êtes en vie et en sécurité, {mf|maître|maîtresse} {name}. Malheureusement, je doute fort que nous puissions nous permettre d'attendre la fin de cette catastrophe bien à l'abri dans un compartiment. »
languages.original_text: "Saints' blood! Then it is small wonder that the heretics are so well organised! I thought his order to seal the passages between decks was his attempt to stop the attackers from spreading to other levels, but now I see the real reason: it was to stop the enforcers from intervening! At least you are alive and now safe, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}. Alas, I doubt we can afford to look for a compartment to sit out this disaster."

traits.locale_text: « Par le sang des saints ! Rien d'étonnant, alors, à ce que les hérétiques soient aussi bien organisés ! J'ai cru qu'en donnant l'ordre de fermer les passages entre les ponts, il cherchait à empêcher les assaillants d'atteindre les autres niveaux, mais en réalité, c'était pour bloquer l'intervention des prévôts ! Au moins, vous êtes en vie et en sécurité, {mf|maître|maîtresse} {name}. Malheureusement, je doute fort que nous puissions nous permettre d'attendre la fin de cette catastrophe bien à l'abri dans un compartiment. »

languages.text: "Blut der Heiligen! Dann ist es kein Wunder, dass die Ketzer so gut organisiert sind! Ich dachte, er will mit seinem Befehl, alle Durchgänge zwischen Decks zu verriegeln, die Angreifer daran hindern, andere Ebenen zu erreichen, aber jetzt erkenne ich den wahren Grund: Die Enforcers sollten nicht eingreifen können! Wenigstens seid Ihr wohlauf und nun auch sicher, {mf|Herr|Herrin} {name}. Leider können wir es uns wohl kaum erlauben, diese Katastrophe in irgendeinem Abteil auszusitzen."
languages.original_text: "Saints' blood! Then it is small wonder that the heretics are so well organised! I thought his order to seal the passages between decks was his attempt to stop the attackers from spreading to other levels, but now I see the real reason: it was to stop the enforcers from intervening! At least you are alive and now safe, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}. Alas, I doubt we can afford to look for a compartment to sit out this disaster."

traits.locale_text: "Beim {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g}-Samen! Dann ist es kein Wunder, dass die Ketzer so gut organisiert sind! Ich dachte, er will mit seinem Befehl, alle Durchgänge zwischen Decks zu verriegeln, die Angreifer daran hindern, andere Ebenen zu erreichen, aber jetzt erkenne ich den wahren Grund: Die Enforcers sollten nicht eingreifen können! Wenigstens seid Ihr wohlauf und nun auch sicher, {mf|Herr|Herrin} {name}. Leider können wir es uns wohl kaum erlauben, diese Katastrophe in irgendeinem Abteil auszusitzen."

"Blut der Heiligen! Dann ist es kein Wunder, dass die Ketzer so gut organisiert sind! Ich dachte, er will mit seinem Befehl, alle Durchgänge zwischen Decks zu verriegeln, die Angreifer daran hindern, andere Ebenen zu erreichen, aber jetzt erkenne ich den wahren Grund: Die Enforcers sollten nicht eingreifen können! Wenigstens seid Ihr wohlauf und nun auch sicher, {mf|Herr|Herrin} {name}. Leider können wir es uns wohl kaum erlauben, diese Katastrophe in irgendeinem Abteil auszusitzen."

languages.original_text: "Grox seed! Then it is small wonder that the heretics are so well organised! I thought his order to seal all passages between decks was his attempt to stop the attackers from spreading to other levels, but now I see the real reason: it was to stop the enforcers from intervening! At least you are alive and now safe, {mf|Master|Mistress} . Alas, I doubt we can afford to look for a compartment to sit out this disaster."

languages.text: "Azizlerin kanı aşkına! Kâfirlerin nasıl böyle organize olabildiği şimdi belli oldu! Güverteler arası geçitleri kapatma emrini, saldırganların diğer katlara yayılmasını önlemek için verdiğini düşünmüştüm ama asıl sebebi çok net anlaşılıyor: İnfazcıların müdahalesini engellemek içinmiş! En azından hayattasınız ve de artık güvendesiniz {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}. Lakin kompartımanlardan birinde oturup felaketin geçmesini bekleme lüksümüz yok maalesef."
languages.original_text: "Saints' blood! Then it is small wonder that the heretics are so well organised! I thought his order to seal the passages between decks was his attempt to stop the attackers from spreading to other levels, but now I see the real reason: it was to stop the enforcers from intervening! At least you are alive and now safe, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}. Alas, I doubt we can afford to look for a compartment to sit out this disaster."

traits.locale_text: "Azizlerin kanı aşkına! Kâfirlerin nasıl böyle organize olabildiği şimdi belli oldu! Güverteler arası geçitleri kapatma emrini, saldırganların diğer katlara yayılmasını önlemek için verdiğini düşünmüştüm ama asıl sebebi çok net anlaşılıyor: İnfazcıların müdahalesini engellemek içinmiş! En azından hayattasınız ve de artık güvendesiniz {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}. Lakin kompartımanlardan birinde oturup felaketin geçmesini bekleme lüksümüz yok maalesef."
